messages.check_comlink_reset: Check your com-link (email) for reset instructions.
messages.bio_lock_active: BIO-LOCK ACTIVE. ENTER AUTHENTICATOR CODE OR BACKUP FRAGMENT.
messages.override_required: EMERGENCY OVERRIDE REQUIRED. CHECK COM-LINK FREQUENCY.
messages.user_registered_please_check_email_to_ve: Identity established. Uplink required for verification.
messages.username_or_email_already_exists: Codename or com-link already exists in the grid.
messages.password_must_contain_at_least_one_upper: Access Key must contain at least one uppercase letter.
messages.password_must_contain_at_least_one_numbe: Access Key must contain at least one number.
messages.password_must_contain_at_least_one_speci: Access Key must contain at least one special character.
messages.if_this_email_exists_a_reset_link_has_be: If this com-link exists, a reset signal has been sent.
messages.password_reset_successfully_you_may_now_: Access Key reset successfully. Jack in possible.
messages.invalid_or_expired_token: Token invalid or signal decay detected.
messages.email_updated_please_check_your_inbox_to: Email updated. Check com-link to re-verify.

alerts.uplink_required: NEW IDENTITY ESTABLISHED. UPLINK REQUIRED: CHECK COM-LINK FOR VERIFICATION SIGNAL.
alerts.emergency_code_sent: A NEW EMERGENCY OVERRIDE CODE HAS BEEN SENT TO YOUR COM-LINK.

messages.fail_delete_cat: Failed to delete category (Default one cannot be deleted if only one remains)

alerts.termination_confirm: WARNING: TERMINAL ACCOUNT TERMINATION DETECTED. ALL DATA WILL BE WIPED FROM THE GRID. PROCEED?
alerts.disable_2fa_confirm: TERMINATING 2FA WILL REDUCE YOUR DEFENSIVE ENCRYPTION. PROCEED?
alerts.identity_shift: IDENTITY FREQUENCY SHIFT DETECTED. RE-ROUTING WILL REQUIRE RE-AUTHENTICATION. JACK IN?
alerts.category_purge_confirm: CATEGORY PURGE WILL VOID ALL ASSOCIATED DIRECTIVE VECTORS. PROCEED WITH DELETION?
alerts.cypher_confirm_msg: EXECUTE ACCESS KEY UPDATE PROTOCOL? THIS ACTION WILL REQUIRE RE-AUTHENTICATION.

security.emergency_override: Emergency Override only. Store in Analog format.

danger.title: DANGER ZONE
danger.warning: To terminate this identity and wipe all associated directives, enter your current password below.

tasks.priority_confirm: PRIORITY RE-ALIGNMENT WILL ALTER THE OPERATIONAL SEQUENCE OF YOUR DIRECTIVES. CONFIRM?
tasks.date_confirm: CHRONO-SYNC RE-ALIGNMENT WILL ALTER THE OPERATIONAL SEQUENCE OF YOUR DIRECTIVES. CONFIRM?
tasks.delete_confirm: DELETING THIS DIRECTIVE WILL PERMANENTLY WIPE IT FROM THE GRID. CONFIRM?

neural_progression.title: // NEURAL PROGRESSION [XP & Ranks]
neural_progression.item1_text: Successful directive execution injects raw Experience Data into your neural core. Higher complexity yields greater rewards.
neural_progression.item2_text: Accumulate data packets to advance your OPERATOR LEVEL. Tracking bar visualizes your sync status with the next rank.
neural_progression.item3_text: Leveling up triggers a system-wide high-spectrum neon feedback loop and atmospheric celebration.

system_access.title: // SYSTEM ACCESS [Auth Protocol]
system_access.item1_text1: Execute NEW IDENTITY to register. Input CODENAME (username), COM-LINK (email), and ACCESS KEY (password).
system_access.item2_text: Access the grid via CODENAME or COM-LINK and your ACCESS KEY.

bio_lock.title: // BIO-LOCK SECURITY [2FA]
bio_lock.item2: Scan the QR MATRIX with your authenticator.
bio_lock.item3: Input code to activate. Future logins will require this sync code.
bio_lock.item4_text: Terminating 2FA triggers a high-priority defensive warning.

directive_execution.title: // DIRECTIVE EXECUTION [Task Management]
directive_execution.item1_text: Input directive parameters and assign PRIORITY. Use ENTER for rapid deployment.
directive_execution.item2_text: Successful initialization triggers a CYAN FEEDBACK PULSE and celebration.
directive_execution.item3_text: Click task title to rename. efficient workflow.
directive_execution.item4_text: Click CATEGORY or PRIORITY badges for themed selection.
directive_execution.item5_text: Mark directives as DONE. System provides NEON FEEDBACK upon completion.

sort_order.title: // SORT ORDER PROTOCOL [Task Management]
sort_order.item1_text: Critical priority. Any directive past its deadline is pinned to the top of the data stream.
sort_order.item2_text: Immediate priority. Directives fated for today follow the Signal Leaks.
sort_order.item3_text: Remaining active directives are sorted by base HIGH > MED > LOW level.
sort_order.item4_text: Completed directives are sorted by the latest completion timestamp (DESC).

category_protocols.title: // CATEGORY PROTOCOLS [Customization]
category_protocols.item1_text: Access your PROFILE to initialize, rename, or delete custom categories.
category_protocols.item2_text: Tag any protocol as STOCKED/DEFAULT (★) to prioritize it in the deployment terminal.
category_protocols.item3_text: Renaming a protocol will retroactively patch all associated archived directives.

neural_search.title: // NEURAL SEARCH & FILTER [Data Retrieval]
neural_search.item1_text: Input keywords into the neural search bar to instantly isolate directives.
neural_search.item2_text: Filter grid by PRIORITY, CATEGORY, or OVERDUE status.
neural_search.item3_text: Execute RESET to clear active filters and restore full data stream.

chrono_sync.title: // CHRONO-SYNC [Scheduling]
chrono_sync.item1_text: Assign execution dates via the CYBER CALENDAR overlay.
chrono_sync.item2_text: Use year navigation controls for long-range planning.
chrono_sync.item3_text: Modify dates directly on active cards via CYBER CONFIRM protocols.

system_resiliency.title: // SYSTEM RESILIENCY [Stability]
system_resiliency.item1_text: The system now utilizes a resilient configuration fallback logic. If `config.local.php` is incomplete, the core grid provides missing parameters (like `DB_HOST`) automatically.
system_resiliency.item2_text: The `install.php` utility now features high-immersion diagnostics, tracking neural link stability and database row counts for immediate verification.

multilingual_sync.title: // MULTILINGUAL SYNC [Language Protocol]
multilingual_sync.item1_text: Utilize the header modules to toggle the neural interface between available languages.
multilingual_sync.item2_text: The grid translates all system directives and parameters instantly after switching.
multilingual_sync.item3_text: Your language preference is locked into your deck's local storage and auto-loaded upon every jack-in.

visual_interface.title: // VISUAL INTERFACE [Theme Switching]
visual_interface.item1_text: Access your PROFILE to toggle between available visual presets. Each theme reconfigures the grid's aesthetic while maintaining core directive integrity.
visual_interface.item2_text: Your visual preference is locked to your neural ID across all sessions until a manual override is initiated.
visual_interface.item3_text: The grid is architected for expansion. New visual modules will be deployed to the theme selector as they are certified for operative use.

danger_zone.title: // DANGER ZONE PROTOCOLS
danger_zone.item1_text: Confirming account deletion triggers the **TERMINAL SECURITY ALERT**. This action is irreversible.
danger_zone.item2_text: Use ABORT to immediately rescue yourself from final termination.

admin.policy_strict_pwd_desc: Enforce heavy encryption protocols (Min 12 chars, Upper, Number, Special).
admin.downgrade_confirm: Downgrade this Admin? They will lose access to this panel.
admin.erase_confirm: ERASE USER {{username}} PERMANENTLY? This cannot be undone.
admin.disable_2fa_confirm: DISABLE 2FA FOR {{username}}? This will remove secondary verification protocols.
